item.description:
The Solas is in the Lennox Hotel.
The Barflys will be playing on the Second floor of the Solas.

Solas/Lennox Hotel

I know it's short notice, But if you can make it come on out this tuesday for
Mike, George and Kara... The Barflys.

The barflys are typically a trio featuring Mike Hermans on Guitar, George Chinaglia on Bass.
and a female vocalist ( Kara) who sits in for some of the songs when they play too.
They are expecting a guest percussionist Devin Lucas to sit in for the night.

They play primarily top 40 rock and blues tunes from artists like U2, Toto, Stevie Wonder, Lou Reed, Asia, Pink Floyd the Beatles and the Police for example.
Stop in for a drink and relax for awhile at the Solas on a Tuesday night.

If you are interested the Solas serves food till at least 11pm I believe, not a bad place to get a bite to eat before the show too.


Hope to Meetup with some of you there.
E-mail me if you have any questions...
item.how_to_find_us: The Solas is a small venue. I will be upstairs at the second floor bar where the Barflies will be playing.
item.name: The Barflys @ the Solas
